meanings.definition: A person who drinks alcohol excessively.
meanings.sent1: The bibbers at the party were loud and rowdy.
meanings.sent2: He is known as the town bibbers because he is always drinking.
meanings.sent3: The bibbers at the bar were having a great time, but they were a bit too loud.
meanings.sent4: The bibbers stumbled out of the pub, their laughter echoing in the night.
meanings.sent5: The bibbers were like a whirlwind of chaos, leaving a trail of empty bottles behind them.

meanings.sent1: She bibbers every weekend until she can barely stand.
meanings.sent2: They bibbers all night long, not caring about the consequences.
meanings.sent3: He bibbers so much that his friends have to carry him home.
meanings.sent4: The river bibbers along its course, never stopping or slowing down.
meanings.sent5: The storm bibbers through the city, leaving destruction in its wake.
